snippet: A 2006 settlement agreement between Lance Armstrong and SCA Promotions regarding a dispute over a bonus payment. SCA had withheld that bonus payment for Armstrong’s 2004 victory because of doping allegations.
lead_paragraph: A 2006 settlement agreement between Lance Armstrong and SCA Promotions regarding a dispute over a bonus payment. SCA had withheld that bonus payment for Armstrong’s 2004 victory because of doping allegations.
